tag_list: cheryl-price, cpsocialpr, blueprint, disabledveterans-org, point2point, context-interactive, nextgen, d-trio-marketing
overview:
Cheryl Price is the principal of CPSocialPR, a social marketing firm, and serves as an acting consultant to blueprint, a digital marketing concern, and DisabledVeterans.org, an advocacy organization for veterans rights.

She brings decades of experience from public relations, marketing and technology firms to her clients’ projects. Cheryl is able to take the holistic view of marketing objectives necessary to execute the long term goals effectively.

Cheryl has previously worked at Point2Point Communications Solutions, NextGen LLC, Context Interactive and d.trio marketing group. She has led technology teams developing both hardware and software, as well as productized services.

Cheryl is an avid art collector, Franchophile and classics aficionado. She lives in Minneapolis, Minnesota and works internationally.
